snippet: The magazine has signed Chase Card Services and United Airlines to sponsor the promotion selling discounted travel packages.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column on Conde Nast Traveler, which has signed Chase Card Services and United Airlines to sponsor a promotion selling discounted travel packages in commemoration of its 25th anniversary.
lead_paragraph: The magazine has signed Chase Card Services and United Airlines to sponsor the promotion selling discounted travel packages.

headline.seo: Condé Nast Traveler Celebrates 25 Years by Selling Adventure
headline.main: Condé Nast Traveler Sees the World in Anniversary Style
headline.print_headline: Seeing the World in Anniversary Style
